channel.title: Important Video - Live Simply so other People can Simply Live
channel.description:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gyvj-Gi_XRk&eurl=https%3A%2F%2Ftwitter.com%2F&feature=player_embedded
The video above is something I think that everyone should see. It reminds me of myself because I'm not always too nice to my
mother, but luckily she's still alive so I can make up for it. Hopefully everyone learns a lesson.

item.title: Important Video - Live Simply so other People can Simply Live
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:13, topic:424285”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=526940.msg3842069#msg3842069 date=1323312878]

Am I the only one that notices that youtube has a speed to play the video at now? What the fuck would that even be useful now.

That is rather odd Andrew, I’m shocked you noticed that, you’re so smart. (:
[/quote]

Reyx7 thinks this is getting kinda old. Reyx7 doesn’t like it when you do stuff over and over.[/quote]
Andrew is removing Reyx7 from his friend list. Reyx7 is bad friend stock.

Read full topic

item.title: Important Video - Live Simply so other People can Simply Live
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

I am grateful for what my parents have done for me, and always will be, but I have other issues with them right now. They think they should be worshiped because they brought me here, that I shouldn’t be able to question their reasoning or their “intellect”. Just because of the type of person I am, I have to question what they and everybody does, simply because I want to know, and they think I’m insulting them. Whatever, wrong place for this discussion.

Read full topic
